summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 262 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 977 m), feels like temperature (up 2.2°C), inside temperature (up 1.6°C), and outside temperature (up 1.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 262.2m lower than yesterday, 91.7m lower than the past week, 977.2m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 745m to 3580m and averaged 1724.2m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, humidity should not be a concern. Rain showers likely, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and sunlight will be very intense and bright. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
